newsitem.title: EGYPT: Misr Oil and Soap sets 3.41 pounds dividend.
newsitem.headline: Misr Oil and Soap sets 3.41 pounds dividend.

text.p: Egypt's Misr Oil and Soap will distribute a 3.41 pound dividend for each of its six million shares for the 1995/6 financial year, the firm's published results showed on Wednesday.
Dividends for the previous financial year were not available. The state privatised about 54 percent of the company in August.

The results showed that Misr Oil and Soap's net distributable profits for 1995/6 were down to 26.576 million pounds from 31.311 million pounds for the previous year. The financial years end on June 30.

The profit was slightly higher than figures made available in September which said Misr Oil and Soap made net after-tax profits of 24.881 million pounds in the financial year 1995/6, down from 26.885 million in 1994/5.
